name: 3D Snowboard Racing - eXtreme Snowboarding Crazy Race Games
name_original: 3D Snowboard Racing - eXtreme Snowboarding Crazy Race Games
description:
Grab your snowboard and get ready for non stop snowboarding action as you twist, turn, dodge, and jump over obstacles in your way as you race down the big mountain!

** FEATURES **

- Super easy controls.
- 3D rendered graphics.
- Cool soundtrack.
- Lots of fun!
